results.name: a(n) = determinant of n X n circulant matrix whose first row is A001358(1), A001358(2), ..., A001358(n) where A001358(n) = n-th semiprime.
comment: Semiprime analog of A066933 Circulant of prime numbers. a(n) alternates in sign. A048954 Wendt determinant of n-th circulant matrix C(n). A052182 Circulant of natural numbers. A086459 Circulant of powers of 2.
link: Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Circulant Matrix.
maple: for r from 1 to n do
for c from 1 to n do
